title: Teen sustained ‘self-inflicted’ wound: Police
content:
One of the two young men killed by gunshots in a south Del Rio neighborhood died of a self-inflicted wound, and the other young man’s fatal injury was not self-inflicted, police said Friday.
The teenagers who died, identified by police as Anthony Rivas, 17, and Pedro Calvillo, 18, were found when Del Rio Police Department officers were dispatched to 406 W. Martinez St. at 11:04 a.m. Monday after receiving a “shots fired” call.
